channel.title: CVE Feed for Yooslider -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yooslider -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-27846|2024-08-03T05:41:10.212Z -- yooslider -- yoo%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20image%20slider%20%26%20video%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Yooslider Yoo Slider <= 2.0.0 on WordPress allows attackers to create or modify slider.

item.title: CVE-2022-25608|2024-08-03T04:42:50.067Z -- yooslider -- yoo%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20image%20slider%20%26%20video%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Yoo Slider – Image Slider & Video Slider (WordPress plugin) allows attackers to trick authenticated users into unwanted slider duplicate or delete action.

item.title: CVE-2022-25609|2024-08-03T04:42:50.032Z -- yooslider -- yoo%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20image%20slider%20%26%20video%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Yoo Slider – Image Slider & Video Slider (WordPress plugin) allows attackers with contributor or higher user role to inject the malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2022-27847|2024-08-03T05:41:09.921Z -- yooslider -- yoo%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20image%20slider%20%26%20video%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Yooslider Yoo Slider <= 2.0.0 on WordPress allows attackers to import templates.

item.title: CVE-2024-31106|2024-08-02T01:46:04.596Z -- yooslider -- yoo%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Yooslider Yoo Slider allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Yoo Slider: from n/a through 2.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-31106|2024-06-04T17:36:58.626Z -- yooslider -- yoo%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Yooslider Yoo Slider allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Yoo Slider: from n/a through 2.1.1.
